title: ADB appoints Mio Oka as country director for India
description: Oka will take charge of steering ADB operations in India and fostering relations with the government and the country's other development partners, ADB said in a statement. She will lead the implementation of ADB's country partnership strategy, 2023-2027 that is designed to catalyse robust, climate-resilient, and inclusive private sector-led growth in India, it said.
